name: Operation HongKong
overview: ...Date: 07 04 1986 :Time: 0600 Hrs: Classification URGENT ... you are an agent of the BND (British National Defence) and you have been summoned by the Prime Minister to appear at Number 10. SDI documents have been stolen by enemy agents. They are believed to be in Honk Kong. If these documents fall into the hands of a foreign power, it would cause a conflict the likes of which no one has seen before!! You have many ports of call to encounter. Your life is in danger as well as many millions more. We rely on you to retrieve the SDI documents and bring them safely back home where they belong. your mission is of upmost priority and must be successfully completed. We all rely on you. Good luck!
